dcterms:creator: R. S. Sutton
A. G. Barto
dcterms:description: The cliff-walking environment is a grid-based reinforcement learning task where the agent must navigate to a goal while avoiding a cliff that incurs a penalty.
dcterms:title: Cliff-walking environment

dcterms:creator: L. Liu
A. Chattopadhyay
U. Mitra
dcterms:description: The randomized graphs are generated using the Erdős-Rényi random-directed graph model, where each edge is created with a certain probability, forming a directed graph used for sampling and creating synthetic Markovian environments.
dcterms:title: Randomized graphs (Erdős-Rényi random-directed graph model)

dcterms:creator: L. Liu
A. Chattopadhyay
U. Mitra
dcterms:description: The SISO wireless network model consists of a single transmitter and receiver, focusing on optimizing the transmission strategy to minimize costs associated with transmission and packet drops.
dcterms:title: SISO wireless network model

dcterms:creator: T. Bozkus
U. Mitra
dcterms:description: The MISO energy harvesting wireless network model involves multiple transmitters and a single receiver, focusing on optimizing the transmission strategy to maximize throughput while minimizing costs related to battery usage and packet drops.
dcterms:title: MISO energy harvesting wireless network with Gaussian interference channels and multiple relays
